entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -15.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 3:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -15.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -24.0°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
